message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $12000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but I am only able to offer $9500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I believe the product's value justifies a higher price point.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I can only commit to $10500. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $11500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I believe it's a fair price for the product's value and quality.
I've considered your latest offer, Alice, and I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise given its value and my budget.

I'm glad we're close, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11500, as I mentioned earlier. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I believe the product's value justifies a slightly higher price point. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price.
